Phone form factor and camera are excellent. Major drawbacks are the heating issue when using camera and the faster battery drain. These may be attributed to the Samsung's Exynos processor's inferior performance. Potential buyers of this phone can buy the S23 instead or wait for the Galaxy S25 which will sport the latest Snapdragon processor which will solve both the drawbacks. S25 is rumoured to be launched in Jan 2025.READ MORE
